  children={"Get specific table metadata"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/databases/{id}/tables/metadata/get"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get metadata for specific tables in a database

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","pattern":"^[0-9a-fA-F]{24}$","description":"MongoDB ObjectId represented as a hexadecimal string","title":"ObjectId"},"description":"Object ID"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"tables":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"List of table names"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Table metadata","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"message":{"type":"string"},"data":{"type":"object"}},"title":"Success"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
